description: Represents an AWS account that is a part of a collaboration

MembershipQueryLogStatus.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ENABLED | DISABLED  
Update requires: No interruption

MembershipStatus.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ACTIVE | REMOVED | COLLABORATION_DELETED  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: An arbitrary set of tags (key-value pairs) for this cleanrooms membership.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An arbitrary set of tags (key-value pairs) for this cleanrooms membership.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

CollaborationIdentifier.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 36  
Maximum Length: 36  
Pattern: [0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}  
Update requires: Replacement

Arn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 100  
Update requires: No interruption

CollaborationArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 100  
Update requires: No interruption

CollaborationCreatorAccountId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 12  
Maximum Length: 12  
Pattern: ^\d+$  
Update requires: No interruption

MembershipIdentifier.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 36  
Maximum Length: 36  
Pattern: [0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}  
Update requires: No interruption
